categories: Category:Unidentified Jedi of the New Jedi Order

nodes.text: An orange-skinned Devaronian male was a Jedi who served the New Jedi Order before the Sith–Imperial War. The Devaronian had orange eyes and wore brown Jedi robes. He was married to a female of his own species, and together they had a Force-sensitive daughter, whom they named Malincha. He advised Malincha to learn to control both her fear and her emotions, reciting from different parts of the Jedi Code. However, both he and his wife were killed by the Dark Lord of the One Sith, Darth Krayt. After their deaths, Malincha was taken by the Sith Lord and trained in the Sith ways, eventually becoming the Sith Lady Darth Maladi.

Darth Maladi's father was created by John Ostrander, the writer of the Star Wars: Legacy comic series. He first appeared in flashbacks to Darth Maladi in the third issue of the Monster story arc. Maladi's father was drawn by Jan Duursema.
